short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Publicate - Create Beautiful Email Newsletters and Web Roundups in minutes, from content you find online.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Send beautiful mobile responsive newsletters in Gmail and Outlook.
The Publicate browser extension helps you to save content for your newsletters with one click.

Easily drag and drop your content to create beautiful responsive newsletters in minutes.

Then browse and send your newsletters straight from inside Gmail and Outlook.

Learn more or try now at https://publicate.it
